content.description: A steep challenging line, the first pitch is a bit runout but not to bad (bolted anchor) 90' 5.9 The second pitch is pretty demanding with two bolts to start then thin cracks to a headwall/bulge.
content.protection: Some thin gear to 2.5" bolted belays (but remember these are 20 year old 5/16" any MAY still be good )
content.location: Just before the col walk right for about 100' to a short ramp below a pin. Best to rap off 180' OR you can go up and left to a smaller upper cliff with some nice short routes then walk down the trail.

content.description: A really cool secluded setting with good south facing rock and quick access from the trail.
